channel.title: Jordan Joe Cooper
channel.description: Writing about technology, engineering leadership, and turning intention into reality.

item.title: Work and artificial intelligence
item.description: The modern printing press with speedboost. AI is changing what human work is and means.

item.title: Quotes / Aphorisms
item.description: Collection of quotes and aphorisms from books, conversations, and podcasts. Wisdom from Charlie Munger, Warren Buffett, Marcus Aurelius, and others.

item.title: How This Site is Built
item.description: A behind-the-scenes look at the technology, structure, and workflow powering jordanjoecooper.com. Fully static HTML with no build process, no dependencies, just pure HTML and CSS.
